text: connects the right with the left side of the Rhine River south of Bonn. The motorway has two or three lanes. The autobahn crosses the Rhine using the Konrad Adenauer Bridge. Along both sides of this bridge are cycle tracks and footpaths. In the center strip there is an urban railway line. ==History== The route was once planned as a part of the A 56, which was to run from Waldbröl to the German/Dutch border in Selfkant. ==Exit list == |} == External links == 562 A562 Category:Bonn
title: Bundesautobahn 562
